text: Story highlights Margulies talks about life after Alicia Florrick The actress is currently working on a new film ( CNN ) Julianna Margulies isn't missing ` ` The Good Wife,'' just yet. The actress, who just wrapped the series finale of her long running CBS drama in June, told CNN she's only beginning to adjust to life after Alicia Florrick. ` ` I haven't missed [ the show ] yet,'' she told CNN at The ACE Awards in New York on Tuesday night. ` ` We probably would be in our third week back at work now if I was still doing it. I really wonder, now that I have the time to think about it, how I did seven years of that show because just the legal dialogue alone. My mind was never still
